Name: TheShooterGame
About the game: GamePlay: Survive as long as possible in the town filled with bad guys. Find guns and ammo in town. Features: • Weapons: Find them around town. Lots of weapons and ammo • Survive: Survive as long as possible in town • FPS: TheShootoutGame is a first person shooter • PlayTime: Keeps track of time played in game • HardCore: No save/load, no hp or armor ui, and no checkpoints • KillCount: Keep track of bad guys killed • World: Your trapped in a town. Kill as much bad guys as you can
